CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper June 1, 1957, pg. 3, reads: "An NAACP Family - The Arthur Stevens family, 44 Miller St., rear, is among the first to sign up in the current NAACP membership campaign. The Rev. Charles H. Foggie, left, president of the Pittsburgh Branch, is showing Mr. Stevens how to enlist all nine members of his family. Mrs. Mary Stevens is holding Blanche and Glenda. Other members of the family, left to right, are Mary, Arthur Jr., James, Wayne and Douglas. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Pittsburgh Branch NACCP president Rev. Charles Foggie and Arthur Stevens holding NAACP membership document, surrounded by Stevens family including Mary Stevens holding Blanche, Arthur Stevens holding Glenda, and Mary, Arthur Jr., James, Wayne, and Douglas Stevens at their home 44 Miller Street
